name: Each Sale I Blow a Balloon
name_original: Each Sale I Blow a Balloon
description:
Hello and welcome one of the weirdest games/experiments available on Steam!

Have you ever wanted to be blown for only 3$? Well, your dream is now a reality! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)



The game/experiment is in Early Access for one year and every time someone buys it, I will record myself blowing a balloon and add it to the game. You can literally fill my house with balloons! The updates with the new clips will be added every week. Have fun watching me blow balloons!



This blowing game also includes a version of "The shell game" (also known as thimblerig, three shells and a pea, the old army game) as it's gameplay!
